extendedInfo.description: Aqua Pets by Bionic Panda Games is the best free fishing, fish tank, and aquarium game for your Android phone. Do you like catching cool fish? Would you like to build a beautiful aquarium filled with cute seals, turtles, fish and other exotic sea creatures? With Aqua Pets, you can build an amazing fish tank or aquarium and turn it into a beautiful free live wallpaper for your Android phone or tablet.Weâve built Aqua Pets to be a really fun game for you to play with your friends and family. Aqua Pets is a lot more fun when you connect with your Facebook friends, email contacts, and friends in your address book - add friends so you can visit their tanks and receive exciting and interesting free gifts in the game. There are so many things you can do in Aqua Pets - make sure you try out all of the really cool features, including the following:- Decorate your aquarium or fish tank and stock it with the coolest fish you can catch- Customize your fish tank with rare, common, and legendary fish- Turn your phone into a gigantic aquarium with our free live wallpaper feature- Discover hidden secrets in the game by fishing with different combinations of rods and bait- Feed your fish and collect rewards the next day- Add friends from Facebook so you can see their tanks and send and receive giftsPlease be sure to set a nickname for yourself in Aqua Pets. Setting a personal nickname will allow you to make friends with other players, send gifts, have players visit your tank and if needed, receive in-game refunds.Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/aquapetsgame"Like" our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Aqua-Pets-Android-Game/184345881616198Aqua Pets is completely free to play. If you are looking for ways to get free coins and pearls, copy and paste this link into your browse:http://bionicpandagames.zendesk.com/entries/20734952-free-coins-pearlsFor any and all questions or comments, please contact us at support@bionicpandagames.com.KNOWN ISSUES:- Sometimes the app fails to install properly. We're unsure why as we have no control over the app install process. This results in the app not opening or not being able to save your game. Uninstalling and reinstalling is the only workaround.- The max level is 100.- Sharing sometimes causes a force close. We're still investigating.- If you are getting a "not enough space" error when trying to install our application, go to Menu->Settings->Manage Applications->Market and tap on the "Clear Cache" button and try again.- We're still battling the force-closes. We will not give up the fight.Keywords: aquarium, live wallpaper, panda, pets, fishing, aquarium wallpaper, fish tank, free games, casual games, free wallpaper, fishing game, free live wallpaper, bionic panda

reviews.title: A great game
reviews.comment: Very enjoyable. You can\'t get all fish or achievements without spending money on pearls.
reviews.author: Pen MacPhee

reviews.title: MOVE THE ADS!!!
reviews.comment: I love playing this game, but the new ads on the fishing screen ruin the timing! It slows down and speeds back up and jumps around, making me lose fish! I don\'t think I\'ll keep plating if this isn\'t resolved soon. Put the ads on the fish tank or the purchase screen if you must, but get them OFF the fishing screen!
reviews.author: Elizabeth Compton

reviews.title: Please move the ads!
reviews.comment: I love this game but with the new update there are ads on the fishing screen and they move and sometimes I miss the fish because it is disorienting. I understand the need for ads but can you please put them somewhere else so it does not interfere with fishing? I don\'t want to waste bait. So I\'m not going to bother with rainbow pellets anymore until this issue is resolved.
reviews.author: Amber Thibaut

reviews.title: great fun
reviews.comment: cute fun game ...... must download don\'t take attention to the fools whom have given foolish and stupid comments

reviews.comment: Worst boring same fishes.. simply waste of time. To this again adds added to the latest version! Too bad.

reviews.title: No new fish... so why upgrade?
reviews.comment: Started boring.. i have been playing this game for so many years, but still no new things, new feature, new fish food, new free gift, new back ground... i m considering to uninstall this game... sad & disappointed.

reviews.title: DOES AQUA PETS EVER READ OUR RATINGS????

reviews.comment: Awsome i love this game i had it for over a year and no problems.  Keep it up!

reviews.comment: New update and still cannot link my game and keep getting technical errors. I miss playing my game. :(

reviews.title: REMOVE ADS!!
reviews.comment: I updated & now there\'s ads that cause the game to freeze up & cause me to miss fish. If updating is going to cause problems then I\'m going to stop playing even though I really love this game.
